description: THE WICKED SIDE OF WIZARDRY Cute girl wizard Marle wants to join the Fairy Tail, a club for the most powerful wizards.

The series begins with the execution of Gol D. Roger, a man known as the King of the Pirates (海賊王 Kaizokuō?). Just before his death, Roger announces that his treasure, the One Piece (ひとつなぎの大秘宝 (ワンピース) Wan Pīsu?).
Bleach follows the adventures of Ichigo Kurosaki after he obtains the powers of a Soul Reaper.
Is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Daisuke Ashihara, and serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump since February 2013.
Revolves around a weak, unassertive boy named Sena Kobayakawa who enters the high school of his choice—Deimon Private Senior High School.
The Straw Hat Pirates make their way to Alabasta, leading to battles with Baroque Works and their leader, Sir Hasano.
Gantz tells the story of Kei Kurono and his friend Masaru Kato who die in a train accident and become part of a semi-posthumous game.
